RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1 1/16M Turf CR: 84. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this ra ce will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STAY LOST no speed to the far turn, rallied into gear in the stretch, clear. OUR FLAG FLYING unhurried to the far turn between horses cleared stretch run down. LA CREMA saved ground to far turn, rallied along in the stretch for show. SUN VALLEY ROAD off rail run throughout, shuffled back into far turn, improved. AADYA saved ground to far turn, shuffled back inside, improved stretch. QUEEN OF ATLANTIS dueled on the lead to far turn with nothing in the stretch run. RUE inside duel to far turn, used up and dropped back readily. KATNAPPING tried to keep up from inside to far turn, gave way readily late. RACE WAS HAND TIMED DUE TO AN EQUIPMENT MALFUNCTION..

ENTRY.NAME: Katnapping
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up from inside to far turn, gave way readily late

ENTRY.NAME: Rue
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside duel to far turn, used up and dropped back readily

ENTRY.OWNER: Five Fillies Stable LLC and Balios Racing Stable

ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to far turn, shuffled back inside, improved stretch

ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the far turn, rallied into gear in the stretch, clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 7, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HESTON dueled along casually to the turn, gained command easily to wire. KOBE BEACH slow into stride, angled in through the turn, ran on best of rest. ONE SOCK BILLY no speed from the start, ran up outside in the turn settled third. LIDIA'S PRAYER dueled to the half folded in the final furlong. HECTOR B through early and dropped back readily. PASION AZTECA tried to keep up to deep stretch, folded in the final furlong. CHEESEBURGER brief speed, gave way readily into the turn and dropped back.

ENTRY.COMMENT: through early and dropped back readily

ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled to the half folded in the final furlong

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1 1/16M Turf CR: 92. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 14400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since September 7, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AVIANO close up off rail to far turn, bottled up in the stretch run for a moment, split horses with a game effort as much the best. BLUEGRASS PARKWAY saved ground while well back to far turn, split horses, missed. WIND TWIST raced back to the far turn with a late kick for show spot. BAKENEKO pressed early, shuffled back to far turn while evenly stretch run. CLEAR FOR ACTION speed to the front dueled early on, cleared far turn, wilted late. SILENT CHAOS raced back while wide into the stretch with no late gain. SUBURBAN PRINCE never menaced throughout. BEOCCA four wide run with the pack first turn kept on to far turn but emptied out in the stretch run. RACE WAS HAND TIMED DUE TO AN EQUIPMENT MALFUNCTION..

ENTRY.NAME: Aviano
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up off rail to far turn, bottled up split horses, gamely

RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROLLESTON quick to the front well handled throughout while much the best. MY TOMMY LEE well placed throughout, off rail run into stretch while no match. TWIRLING RUTH quick to chase winner throughout settled for show spot. GENERAL GINNY broke a bit tardy from the gate, angled in stretch run to improve. TIMELESS GLORY raced along evenly from the turn and stretch run, no late gain. HIGH MEADOWS along evenly with no response when needed. MISS SOVELIA outside run to the turn with no late kick. JOYFUL NOISE never in contention. ROYAL TO BE tried to keep to the turn with no response in the stretch run. POQUITO ROSE through after half, dropped back readily. EIDA'S STORM through early, dropped back readily thereafter.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: FOR THE BISCUIT chased early, spurted clear in the turn, went clear as tons the best. TRIBAL SPIRIT between horses to the quarter pole, chased winner home no match. VILLAREGGIA raced along evenly while missing place while best of the rest. DR. BELLA off rail trip to the turn with no response in the stretch run. SOULSTONE never menaced throughout. MARKET OF STOCKS raced along evenly with no response when needed. C C'S WORLD could not keep up to the turn and faltered in the stretch run. SPICY SOMMELIER chased to the turn, could keep up and faded back. ZUPITA brief spurt to lead, stopped to a walk from quarter pole to wire.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M Turf CR: 63. Maiden Claiming Purse 9100. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: POINT WELL TAKEN rated off leaders to the stretch with a late kick to go clear. LAST CHANCE DANCE well positioned throughout, rallied along in the stretch for 2nd. CAPTIVE STAR chased leader to far turn, short lead dueled stretch outgamed. EXPLOSIVE SKIES unhurried to far turn, raced along with a mild run in the stretch. BIRD SET FREE no speed to far turn, improved position to the wire, no menace. PROVOLONE raced in good position early on with no late kick in the stretch. CAIRO WINNER no speed to far turn, improved to far turn, flattened out stretch. MIDNIGHT XO saved ground throughout while racing back in the stretch run. SOUTHERN MESA never factored throughout. BASEBALL PEGGE speed to the front set pace to the half and faltered back readily. LA COPA through after half and dropped back with little resistance. DOGWOODS BECCA pulled up early on and vanned off. RACE WAS HAND TIMED DUE TO AN EQUIPMENT MALFUNCTION..

RACE.FOOTNOTES: GAMBLER good position to the turn, rallied on to the lead, cleared in the stretch, held sway to the wire well handled. PERFECT WAGER good position never far back to the turn, rallied on for place. THIS ILL DEFEND no speed to the stretch, rallied and split horses for show spot. UNCAPTURED PULSE broke sharp outside, between horses to turn in front, faltered. ABOUNDING raced along evenly with nothing left for the stretch run. GIANT TRICK chased, took over to the turn, came up empty in the stretch run. MUSTANG WILLIE never factored throughout.
